{"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"7","subject":"Phase 5: Tests - test_collection.py","description":"Create tests/test_collection.py with:
- DB tests: table creation, FK constraints, migration
- Dedup tests: pHash computation, hamming distance, duplicate detection
- LLM tests: query expansion (mocked)
- Collector tests: download success/failure/timeout (mocked)

Follow existing test patterns from tests/test_database.py and tests/test_feedback.py:
- pytest fixtures
- Temporary DB for isolation
- Mock external APIs","assignedBy":"team-lead","timestamp":"2026-02-10T03:18:39.073Z"}
